projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_V01.xmlfile.

revisionDesc.change: Additional global changes for compatibility with DHARMA
Updating toward the encoding template v03

Initial import: harmonising file structure with DHARMA inscription template v02. Text and comments as inherited from the Siddham archive of January 2019, unless otherwise indicated (by a name and date in the comment). Comments are offered "as is" and do not represent a thoroughly considered or researched opinion.

div.p:
svasti . saṁvat sar e 3 śrāva śu di 2 parama-bhaṭṭāraka-mahārājādhirāja-śrī s-toramāṇe pr̥thivīm anuśāsati tat-prasādād viṣayapati
- mahā rāja-bhūtasya śivabhāga-
m p ure bhujyamānake vadrapālyāḥ pūrvvasyā n diśi Etad-rājamā tu r vvīrāḍhyikā-kārita
ka-d eva-jayasvāmi-pādānāṁ bali-caru-satra-dhūpa-gandha-puṣpa-dīpa-taila-khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-pra tisaṁskāraṇ
ā o payogya ṁ
m ātmanaḥ puṇyābhivr̥ddhaye caturddiśābhyāgataka-vaideśya-vāṇijakāḥ vastavyāḥ poṭṭalikā-putrāś ca lekhayanti
yatra guḍa-lavana-karppāsa-bhāṇḍa-bharakeṣu Ācandrārkkārṇṇava-kṣiti-sthiti-sama-kāl īyaṁ daśa-viṁśopa
kīnakaḥ bhāṇḍa-bharakaḥ Arddha-pādīnakaḥ lavaṇa-bharakaḥ setinakaḥ dhānya-bhallā setīnikā dhānya-śakaṭa
m arddha-kauṭubikaṁ garddabha-bhāṇḍa-bharako v īśopaka-divarddha-setakaḥ bhāṇḍa-p
ā o ṭṭalikā viṁśopakiniki dhānya-bharakeṣu
dhānya-setikā Ato rddhaṁ garddabha-bharakeṣu dāsī-guṇṭhaṁ pad ūna-rūpīnakaṁ

etāṁ cākṣayaṇīṁ Upari-likhita-nyāyena
dīyamānāṁ yaḥ vaṇi g-grāmābhyantaraḥ puṭṭalikā-putro vā kaścid apramāṇī-kariṣyati saḥ pañcabhir mmahā-pātakaiḥ saṁ
yukto
bhaviṣyanti bhaviṣyati

evaṁ cāsya pramāṇaṁ vāṇiyakāḥ sva-hastena lekhayanti . dāgapura-vāstavya gomika
d v ematta . māthura-saṁnihi
ta-māthurika-vāstavya senavarmmā . kanyakuldāka pitr̥yaśa cirāyuṣa . Aujjenaka ṁtphuśūebhaśśama . varuṇodarī-vāstavya poṭṭa
likā-putra droṇa soma bhakkala . mahiṣahradaka bhannitya dhruvabhakṣaṇa Agniśarmma pracakāsaka bhakkūra śūra goṇḍata
raka rudradatta priya ṇkara yaśaka bhāraṇabhaṭṭīśaśarmma kāloṭṭiyakabhaṭṭi vāsta
vā vya sa ṁṅgāḍhyaka yajña goggabhaṭṭiyaka
bhagavadvinīta skāndavarmma bhāhasti harimata moha bha dvija bhagguṇa rivāsula vāṇijaka vāstavya datta gujjara bharo
putra bhaṭṭi-mahattara bhaṭṭi-rudra maheśvara-svāmika maheśvara mallaka saṅgama karkkaṭa devaṭa

atraiva cākṣayaṇī-hetoḥ vāṇija
ka ṣaṣṭhi gr̥ ha- vastu ceti|||
